content.html: My parents think I’m a loony lib for thinking about a heat pump for the new house. Boomers grew up in the era of cheap energy and it was easy to ignore the crisis they got us into. What I can’t understand is ignorance of the mounting evidence and that in the end efficiency wins
content.value:
My parents think I’m a loony lib for thinking about a heat pump for the new house.

Boomers grew up in the era of cheap energy and it was easy to ignore the crisis they got us into.

What I can’t understand is ignorance of the mounting evidence and that in the end efficiency wins
